body:
jerichopumpkin @ forum asks:
Is possible to add the X cost to planeswalker abilities? I want to do Chandra Nalaar, but as of things are now, it's not possible.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: support removing X counters as cost

comments.body: I'm having a long-term look at the use of counters, it's a bit of a big project, but I'm hoping that one day I can get to 'Remove <n> <CounterType> counters from SN' as a cost. If that becomes possible, X would be the next step.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
